#summary This page describes how to configure the Eclipse-CS plugin for Instinct.
#labels Development
= Introduction =

1. Ensure that you have setup the plugin as per [CheckstyleForEclipse]

2. We need to generate a checkstyle configuration file for eclipse. If a file named {{{checkstyle-main-eclipse.xml}}} exists in the {{{installation_dir/core/etc/checkstyle/}}} directory, then delete it. Open command prompt and run 
{{{
./build.sh setup-eclipse
}}} 
on Linux or 

{{{
build.cm setup-eclipse
}}} 
on Windows.

from the {{{installation_dir/core}}} directory. This will create a file called {{{checkstyle-main-eclipse.xml}}} within {{{installation_dir/core/etc/checkstyle}}} directory.

3. Select *Window*->*Preferences...*->*Checkstyle*. The default configuration should be as follows:

http://instinct.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/Eclipse_CS_Plugin.png

4. Click *New..*. 

http://instinct.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/Eclipse_CS_Check_Configuration_Properties.png

5. Choose *Internal Configuration* for "Type" and enter "Instinct Checks" for both "Name and "Description" fields (or anything your heart desires). 

6. Click the *Import...* button down the bottom and browse to the {{{installation_dir/core/etc/checkstyle/checkstyle-main-eclipse.xml}}} file.

7 Click *OK* twice. Your configuration should look something like:

http://instinct.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/Eclipse_CS_Preferences_With_Instinct_Checks.png


8. Select *eclipse-instinct-core* in the Package tree. Press *Alt+Enter* to display the project properties window. Choose *Checkstyle*. Uncheck the *Use simple configuration* option if checked. Your configuration for Checkstyle should look like the following:

http://instinct.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/Eclipse_CS_Properties_No_Checkers.png

9. Click *Add...*

http://instinct.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/Eclipse_CS_Core_Checkstyle_FS.png

10. Enter "Instinct Core Checks File Set" into the "File Set Name" and choose *Instinct Checks - (Global)* for the "Check Configuration" option.

11. Choose *New...*

http://instinct.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/Eclipse_CS_Regex_Matcher.png

12. Enter each of the following Regular expressions and click *OK* after each one:

||Expression||Pattern includes files||
||.properties$||checked||
||src/spec||unchecked||
||src/test||unchecked||

Your final expression patterns should look like the following:

http://instinct.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/Eclipse_CS_Common_Filters.png

13. Click *OK*. Check *Checkstyle active for this project* on the Checkstyle configuration tab. Your Checkstyle configuration should look like:

http://instinct.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/Eclipse_CS_Final_Checks_FS.png
